titleStmt.title: Pilulae Antiscorbuticae. Pills against that epidemic disease the scurvy, with all its symptoms ...

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.

Item at reel position E8:2[140] appears to be a slightly different setting, i.e. this document has "epidemick disease" instead, in first line of text; both pages [2] torn at head slightly affecting text.
